Class
Description
AsyncEventCaller<E>
An interface that supports async event calling.
EventCaller<E>
An interface to call events.

An interface to provide simple implementations of interfaces such as EventCaller and EventSubscriber.
EventServiceProvider.Factory<K,E,O>
A factory interface to create EventServiceProvider.
EventSubscriber<K,E,O>
An interface to manage listeners.
ListenerBase<K,E,O>
A record to define the listener.
ListenerExceptionHandler<K,E,O>
An interface to handle the exception that is thrown from SubscribedListener.consumer().

The operations that indicates what the EventCaller should do next
ListenerFactory<K,E,O>
An interface to create/subscribe a listener.
Priority
An interface to set the listener's priority.
SubscribedListener<K,E,O>
An interface to hold the subscribed listener.
